translated: The result is not different because the cooperating causes are different.

original: thag bzangs gzhan dang gzhan yod kyang snam bu tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thag bzangs gzhan dang gzhan yod kyang snam bu tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Even though there are many different threads, the cloth is not different.

original: 'dir brjod pa dbugs 'byung rngub dag kyang du ma yin pa'i phyir thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa dbugs 'byung rngub dag kyang du ma yin pa'i phyir thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Here we say: Since exhalation and inhalation are also multiple, the same consequence would follow.

original: yan lag gcig ma tshang yang mi 'gyur ba'am du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag gcig ma tshang yang mi 'gyur ba'am du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one part is missing, there would be no change or many would arise.

original: lus bzhin du 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag kyang gcig nyid du mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: lus bzhin du 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag kyang gcig nyid du mi 'grub bo //
translated: Like the body, the in-breath and out-breath are not established as one.

original: 'on te gcig nyid du 'dod na //
analyzed: 'on te gcig nyid du 'dod na //
translated: But if they are asserted to be one,

original: de la yang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de la yang brjod pa ni /
translated: then this is said:

original: gcig nyid yin na'ang mang gsal 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig nyid yin na'ang mang gsal 'gyur //
translated: Even if they are one, there would be the manifestation of many,

original: de rgyu rtag tu nye phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyu rtag tu nye phyir ro //
translated: because the cause is always present.

original: gal te du ma rgyu min na //
analyzed: gal te du ma rgyu min na //
translated: If they are not the cause of many,

original: rim gyis kyang min khyad med phyir //
analyzed: rim gyis kyang min khyad med phyir //
translated: then they are not gradual, because there is no difference.

original: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid yin yang /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid yin yang /
translated: Even if the in-breath and out-breath are one,

original: du ma gsal ba nyid de des na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yid du mar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: du ma gsal ba nyid de des na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yid du mar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: there would be the manifestation of many, and therefore the consequence of many minds of attachment and so on would follow,

original: de'i rgyu rtag tu nye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu rtag tu nye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cause of that is always present.

original: rgyu nye ba yang mi 'byung na de de'i rgyu can zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
analyzed: rgyu nye ba yang mi 'byung na de de'i rgyu can zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
translated: If the cause is not present, it is not tenable to say that it is the cause of that.

original: 'on te du ma'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te du ma'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: But if they are not the cause of many,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because cause and effect are individually ascertained.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nges pa la ni brgal zhing brtags par 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nges pa la ni brgal zhing brtags par 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not proper to dispute and investigate the certainty of cause and effect.

original: me ni du ba gcig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: me ni du ba gcig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: Fire produces only one smoke.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no distinction.

original: me las ni rang bzhin de nyid las du ba gzhan dang gzhan dmigs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: me las ni rang bzhin de nyid las du ba gzhan dang gzhan dmigs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: From fire, only that nature of smoke is observed, not another.

original: 'dir ni dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de nyid sad par byed pa'i rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba las /
analyzed: 'dir ni dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de nyid sad par byed pa'i rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba las /
translated: But here, from the very nature of the exhalation, etc., following other and other conditions that awaken it,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba yin no //
translated: other and other minds such as desire arise.

original: sad par byed pa'i rkyen kyang nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sad par byed pa'i rkyen kyang nges pa ma yin te /
translated: And the conditions that awaken it are not certain,

original: sngon gyi 'du byed pa stobs dang ldan @92b pa dang / mi ldan pa nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon gyi 'du byed pa stobs dang ldan @92b pa dang / mi ldan pa nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the prior formative forces are the cause, whether powerful or not.

original: des na gal te dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa 'di sems kyi rgyu ma yin na ni /
analyzed: des na gal te dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa 'di sems kyi rgyu ma yin na ni /
translated: Therefore, if this exhalation, etc. is not the cause of mind,

original: phyis kyang de dang khyad par med pas mi 'byung ba'i phyir rim gyis kyang du ma'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: phyis kyang de dang khyad par med pas mi 'byung ba'i phyir rim gyis kyang du ma'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Since it is not different from that later, it is not the cause of many.

original: sngon gyi 'du byed pa nyid rgyur thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩdbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid du khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: sngon gyi 'du byed pa nyid rgyur thal bar 'gyur ro // dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid du khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa yin te /
translated: It follows that the prior formative forces are the cause.

original: 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: It is said that the in-breath and so on are asserted to be one, but that is not tenable.

original: 'di ltar / dbugs gcig la yang don du ma //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dbugs gcig la yang don du ma //
translated: Because in one breath there are many objects,

original: 'dzin phyir de las nges ma yin //
analyzed: 'dzin phyir de las nges ma yin //
translated: it is not ascertained from that.

original: du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
analyzed: du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
translated: If many are known by one cognition,

original: de ni cig car nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: de ni cig car nyid 'gyur te //
translated: that is simultaneous.

original: 'gal ba med phyir rim gyis kyang //
analyzed: 'gal ba med phyir rim gyis kyang //
translated: Because there is no contradiction, it is not gradual,

original: mi 'gyur khyad par med phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur khyad par med phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: ring du phyir 'byung ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byung ba gcig la yang blo du ma 'byung ba'i phyir dbugs la sogs pa ni nges par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ring du phyir 'byung ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byung ba gcig la yang blo du ma 'byung ba'i phyir dbugs la sogs pa ni nges par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because many cognitions occur in one breath, such as long exhalation, breath is not the determiner.

original: 'o na ga las nges pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ga las nges pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúFrom what is it ascertained?‚Äù

original: 'dzin pa de las te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa de las te /
translated: it is ascertained from the apprehension.

original: 'dzin pa snga ma snga ma nyid sems phyi ma phyi ma nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin pa snga ma snga ma nyid sems phyi ma phyi ma nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The preceding apprehension is the cause of the subsequent mind.

original: 'on te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig nyid rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa des na blo du ma ma yin no zhes brjod na /
analyzed: 'on te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig nyid rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa des na blo du ma ma yin no zhes brjod na /
translated: But if you say that a single mental consciousness has the nature of apprehending many objects sequentially, and therefore there is no plurality of minds,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i yid gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i yid gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no other mind that is different from the aspects of form and so on.

original: gal te yid ni me long shin tu gsal ba lta bu khyab par byed pa gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te yid ni me long shin tu gsal ba lta bu khyab par byed pa gcig nyid yin no //
translated: If you say that mind is like a very clear mirror and is a single, pervasive entity,

original: de ni don gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: de ni don gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pa yin na /
translated: and that it is related to the reflection of an object,

original: de la brjod pa /
analyzed: de la brjod pa /
translated: we reply:

original: gal te rnam par shes pa bya ba med pa nyid la thob par bya ba'i don gyi gzugs brnyan skye ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa bya ba med pa nyid la thob par bya ba'i don gyi gzugs brnyan skye ba yin na /
translated: If a consciousness that is devoid of activity generates the reflection of an object to be attained,

original: don rnams la nye ba'i rim pa khyad par can med pa'i phyir don cig car 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don rnams la nye ba'i rim pa khyad par can med pa'i phyir don cig car 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that objects would be apprehended simultaneously, because there would be no special order of proximity to the objects.

original: 'on te goms pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa las de lta ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te goms pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa las de lta ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not so, because of the order of the special development of habit,

original: 'o na de nyid don gyi rnam pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na de nyid don gyi rnam pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
translated: then that very object is the cause of the form,

original: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and exhalation, etc., are not.

original: me long bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni cig car don 'dzin par 'gyur te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te de'i tshe nus pa med na rim gyis kyang don de 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: me long bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni cig car don 'dzin par 'gyur te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro // 'on te de'i tshe nus pa med na rim gyis kyang don de 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Consciousness, like a mirror, simultaneously grasps the object, because there is no contradiction.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if it is powerless at that time, then it does not grasp the object in order, because there is no difference.

original: 'on te 'di snyam du de la yang skad cig gi dbye ba yod pa nyid do /
analyzed: 'on te 'di snyam du de la yang skad cig gi dbye ba yod pa nyid do /
translated: But if you think that it has the division of moments,

original: des na skad cig gi dbye bas rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /üîΩ'di yang lan @93a * //
analyzed: des na skad cig gi dbye bas rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa yin no zhe na / 'di yang lan @93a * //
translated: then it grasps many objects in order through the division of moments.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This also is not an answer.

original: 'di ltar / rang rigs min pa'i dus can gyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rang rigs min pa'i dus can gyi //
translated: Because:

original: dbugs kyi skad cig mang po dag / gal te de 'dra'i sems nyid kyi //
analyzed: dbugs kyi skad cig mang po dag / gal te de 'dra'i sems nyid kyi //
translated: Many moments of breath, not of the same kind,

original: rgyu yin par ni rtog byed na //
analyzed: rgyu yin par ni rtog byed na //
translated: If you imagine to be the cause of such a mind,

original: go rims ldan pa'i rgyu med par //
analyzed: go rims ldan pa'i rgyu med par //
translated: How could they be sequential

original: de dag rim ldan ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag rim ldan ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: without a sequential cause?

original: rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid na //
analyzed: rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid na //
translated: If the prior type is the cause,

original: dang po 'byung bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: dang po 'byung bar mi 'gyur te //
translated: the first would not occur.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: de rgyu de 'dra yod ma yin //
analyzed: de rgyu de 'dra yod ma yin //
translated: there is no such cause.

original: dbugs 'byung tha dad yul can phyir //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung tha dad yul can phyir //
translated: Because exhalation and inhalation have different objects,

original: yod kyang du ma nyid de des //
analyzed: yod kyang du ma nyid de des //
translated: even if they exist, they are many.

original: de phyir blo ni cig car skye //
analyzed: de phyir blo ni cig car skye //
translated: Therefore the cognition arises simultaneously.

original: dbugs skad cig ma zhes nged la ni grub pa nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: dbugs skad cig ma zhes nged la ni grub pa nyid yin mod kyi /
translated: We do indeed establish that inhalation and exhalation are momentary,

original: khyed la ni de grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed la ni de grub pa ma yin no //
translated: but you do not establish that.

original: 'on te tshad mas mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te tshad mas mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: But if you say that it is established because it is seen by valid cognition,

original: de ni grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni grub pa nyid do //
translated: then it is established.

original: rim gyis 'byung ba na don gcig tu rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba na don gcig tu rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If they occur sequentially, it is not logical that they have the same object.

original: des na rgyu rim can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na rgyu rim can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore because the cause is sequential,

original: 'bras bu yang rim pa dang ldan pa yin pas rnam par shes pa rim pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rim pa dang ldan pa yin pas rnam par shes pa rim pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: the effect is also sequential. Therefore consciousness is sequential.

original: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa de nyid go rims dang ldan pa'i rgyu med par ji ltar rim pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa de nyid go rims dang ldan pa'i rgyu med par ji ltar rim pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: How can the order of inhalation and so on be orderly without a cause?

original: snga ma snga ma'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i go rims las so zhe na /
analyzed: snga ma snga ma'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i go rims las so zhe na /
translated: If you say that order is due to the order of the cause of inhalation and so on,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rang gi rigs snga ma rgyu nyid yin na /
analyzed: rang gi rigs snga ma rgyu nyid yin na /
translated: If the cause of inhalation and so on is the prior homogeneous cause,

original: dang po'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dang po'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
translated: then the first inhalation and so on would be impossible,

original: de 'dra ba dang po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dra ba dang po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first of such a kind does not exist.

original: 'jig rten pha rol khas len na ni skye ba snga ma'i dbugs rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol khas len na ni skye ba snga ma'i dbugs rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you accept a prior world, then the cause of inhalation would be a prior birth.

original: pha ma'i dbugs rgyu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: pha ma'i dbugs rgyu yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cause of inhalation is the parents,

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba thams cad kyi tshe 'byung bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba thams cad kyi tshe 'byung bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it follows that inhalation would occur at all times, because it would be of that nature.

original: de lta yin na ni blo yang pha mas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta yin na ni blo yang pha mas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If that were so, then because the mind is also generated by the parents,

original: thal ba snga ma yin no //
analyzed: thal ba snga ma yin no //
translated: the previous absurd consequence would apply.

original: khas blangs nas brjod de /
analyzed: khas blangs nas brjod de /
translated: This is stated having accepted the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: dbugs rnams ni du ma nyid de yul tha dad pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyul du ma dang 'brel ba 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa can ni /
analyzed: dbugs rnams ni du ma nyid de yul tha dad pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro // yul du ma dang 'brel ba 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa can ni /
translated: The breath is multiple, because it is related to different objects.üîΩA single entity cannot be related to multiple objects, because that would contradict its being a single entity.

original: du ma'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And a single entity cannot be the cause of multiple entities.

original: dbugs du ma yin pa'i phyir ming rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar thal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dbugs du ma yin pa'i phyir ming rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar thal bar 'gyur la /
translated: If the breath is multiple, then it follows that the consciousness of the name would be multiple.

original: rigs mthun pa'i yid ni rim gyis 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i yid ni rim gyis 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The mind of the same type arises in succession.

original: skad cig tha dad pa nyid kyis 'bras bu tha dad par ni ma zad de /
analyzed: skad cig tha dad pa nyid kyis 'bras bu tha dad par ni ma zad de /
translated: Not only is the result different because of the difference in moments,

original: ji ltar rigs mthun pa'i rgyu du ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar rigs mthun pa'i rgyu du ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: but just as the cause of the same type is multiple,

original: 'bras bu yang yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang yin no //
translated: so too is the result.

original: gal te tshogs pa las skye ba can du ma las gcig nyid skye ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa las skye ba can du ma las gcig nyid skye ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If the result arises from a collection, then how can a single entity arise from multiple causes?

original: 'di ni lan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni lan ma yin te /
translated: This is not an answer.

original: gal te du ma'ang @93b gcig dus can //
analyzed: gal te du ma'ang @93b gcig dus can //
translated: If the many have a single time,

original: sems gcig gi ni rgyu yin na //üîΩdbugs rgyu zhen pa la sogs su //
analyzed: sems gcig gi ni rgyu yin na // dbugs rgyu zhen pa la sogs su //
translated: and are the cause of a single mind,

original: gcig ma tshang na'ang mi 'byung 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig ma tshang na'ang mi 'byung 'gyur //
translated: then when one of the causes is missing,üîΩthe breath, the thought, and so on, the result will not occur.

original: ci ste ji ltar yod rgyu yin //
analyzed: ci ste ji ltar yod rgyu yin //
translated: If it is asked how it exists,

original: shes pa la yang khyad yod 'gyur //üîΩgang phyir gang gi tha dad las //
analyzed: shes pa la yang khyad yod 'gyur // gang phyir gang gi tha dad las //
translated: it would be different from consciousness.üîΩBecause it is not different from that

original: tha dad min te de 'bras min //
analyzed: tha dad min te de 'bras min //
translated: which is different, it is not its effect.

original: du mas gcig skyed na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: du mas gcig skyed na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
translated: If many produce one, there are two possibilities:

original: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sam /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sam /
translated: either the collection is the nature of the effect,

original: 'on te gzhan du yin /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan du yin /
translated: or it is something else.

original: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis yin na dbugs zhan pa dang dbugs mi rgyu ba la sogs pa la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis yin na dbugs zhan pa dang dbugs mi rgyu ba la sogs pa la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the collection is the nature of the effect, it would not arise in weak breathing, breathlessness, and so on, because the collection does not exist.

original: tshogs pa las skye ba'i 'bras bu'i chos ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa las skye ba'i 'bras bu'i chos ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the nature of an effect that arises from a collection:

original: tshogs pa nyams pa dang ma tshang ba dag tu mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa nyams pa dang ma tshang ba dag tu mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: it does not occur when the collection is impaired or incomplete.

original: de med par 'byung na ni de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de med par 'byung na ni de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
translated: If it arises without that, it is not the effect of that.

original: 'on te ji ltar nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu yin gyi /
translated: But if it is thought that just the present is the cause,

original: tshogs pa nyid ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: tshogs pa nyid ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: not the collection,

original: de lta na 'o na nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu ma yin te /
translated: then in that case the present is not the cause.

original: nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: and it is not present.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: But this is not so.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the relation of cause and effect is established on the basis of the relation of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa las ni 'bras bu tshogs pa nyid yin la /üîΩnyams pa las ni med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba las ni gzhan du gyur pa nyid do zhes nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa las ni 'bras bu tshogs pa nyid yin la / nyams pa las ni med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba las ni gzhan du gyur pa nyid do zhes nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect is the collection of causes and conditions,üîΩand the non-existence of the effect is the non-existence of the collection of causes and conditions.

original: gang gi khyad par las khyad par du mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi khyad par las khyad par du mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: That which does not become different due to the difference of the other is not the effect of the other.

original: de yod na yod pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yod na yod pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the existence of the effect is due to the existence of the cause,

original: ma yin te /üîΩde yod na yod pa nyid ni de 'gyur na 'gyur ba nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yin te / de yod na yod pa nyid ni de 'gyur na 'gyur ba nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
translated: No,üîΩfor if it exists, its existence is understood from the existence of that which is to be appropriated.üîΩ

original: de yod na ni yod tsam gyis //üîΩgal te rgyu 'bras nyid yin na //
analyzed: de yod na ni yod tsam gyis // gal te rgyu 'bras nyid yin na //
translated: Because the existence of the effect is understood from the existence of the cause only when the effect is produced from the cause.üîΩIf the existence of the effect is due to the existence of the cause,

original: rnam 'gyur rgyu med can 'gyur te //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur rgyu med can 'gyur te //
translated: then the effect would be causeless,

original: de ltar thams cad rgyu med 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad rgyu med 'gyur //
translated: and everything would be causeless.

original: gal te de yod na de yod pa tsam 'ba' zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan du khas len na rnam par 'gyur ba rgyu med pa can nyid du thal lo //
analyzed: gal te de yod na de yod pa tsam 'ba' zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan du khas len na rnam par 'gyur ba rgyu med pa can nyid du thal lo //
translated: If you accept that it exists, and that its mere existence is the reason for being cause and effect, then it follows that the transformation would be without a cause.

original: 'on te rnam par 'gyur ba de yang de tsam nyid las yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par 'gyur ba de yang de tsam nyid las yin na /
translated: But if that transformation also comes from that mere thing,

original: dang po nyid ci'i phyir ma skyes //
analyzed: dang po nyid ci'i phyir ma skyes //
translated: why does it not arise in the beginning?

original: de 'gyur ba med pa nyid na skye ba yin na /
analyzed: de 'gyur ba med pa nyid na skye ba yin na /
translated: If it arises because it is not transformed,

original: dang po nyid 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po nyid 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be transformed in the beginning.

original: gang khyad par med par khyad par du 'gyur ba de de'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bshad zin te /
analyzed: gang khyad par med par khyad par du 'gyur ba de de'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bshad zin te /
translated: We have already explained that if something is not different, it cannot become different.

original: des na ci ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par rgyu med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: des na ci ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par rgyu med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, just as the transformation is without a cause,

original: dngos po de yang yin te /
analyzed: dngos po de yang yin te /
translated: so too is that thing.

original: des na de yod @94a * //
analyzed: des na de yod @94a * //
translated: Therefore, if it exists,

original: na yod pa nyid kyang ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: na yod pa nyid kyang ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
translated: how can its existence be understood?

original: 'dis ni yongs su 'gyur ba yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni yongs su 'gyur ba yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also refutes complete transformation.

original: rim gyis 'gyur ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par la ltos pa'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no zhes brjod pa de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rim gyis 'gyur ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par la ltos pa'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no zhes brjod pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not so, that consciousness arises from the body itself, which depends on a special transformation of the series.

original: yongs su 'gyur ba'i rim pa de //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba'i rim pa de //
translated: The special transformation of the series

original: lus nyid las ni 'byung min te //
analyzed: lus nyid las ni 'byung min te //
translated: does not arise from the body itself.

original: lus khyad med phyir de yi yang //
analyzed: lus khyad med phyir de yi yang //
translated: Because the body is not special,

original: khyad par gang nas 'byung ba yin //üîΩji ltar yongs su 'gyur ba khyad par med pa las rnam par shes pa khyad par med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: khyad par gang nas 'byung ba yin // ji ltar yongs su 'gyur ba khyad par med pa las rnam par shes pa khyad par med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: from what is its special transformation?

original: lus khyad par med pa las yongs su 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lus khyad par med pa las yongs su 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Just as the special transformation of milk does not arise from the body of the cow, because it is not special, but from milk, which is special, so too, the special transformation of consciousness does not arise from the body, which is not special, but from consciousness, which is special.

original: gal te 'o ma la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par de khyad par med par yang dus kyi mthar thug pa tsam las mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'o ma la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par de khyad par med par yang dus kyi mthar thug pa tsam las mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: If you say that the special transformation of milk, etc., is not seen to arise from the special milk, etc., because it is not special, but only from the body, which is not special,

original: de bzhin du lus kyang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyang yin no zhe na /
translated: then the same would apply to the body.

original: 'di ni snying po med de /
analyzed: 'di ni snying po med de /
translated: But this is not reasonable, becauseüîΩthe special transformation of milk, etc.,

original: 'di ltar / 'o ma mtshungs pa las byung ba ;
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'o ma mtshungs pa las byung ba ;
translated: arises from milk, etc., which is special.

original: / zho la sogs kyi rnam 'gyur ni //üîΩmtshungs nyid lus kyi rnam 'gyur ni //
analyzed: / zho la sogs kyi rnam 'gyur ni // mtshungs nyid lus kyi rnam 'gyur ni //
translated: The transformation of milk into curds, etc.üîΩis similar.

original: khyad par can du 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: khyad par can du 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: The transformation of the body is different.

original: 'o ma mtshungs pa nye bar gnas shing drod mtshungs pa nyid yin na ni zho la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o ma mtshungs pa nye bar gnas shing drod mtshungs pa nyid yin na ni zho la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: When the milk is similar and the heat is similar, the transformation of the curds, etc. is similar.

original: lus ni mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa dag la rjes su mthun pa goms pa'i bag chags rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa'i shes pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: lus ni mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa dag la rjes su mthun pa goms pa'i bag chags rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa'i shes pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi rgyu yin no //
translated: The body, whether similar or dissimilar, is the cause of the different and non-different cognitions of the conceptual thoughts, etc. of the habitual tendencies of the concordant practice.

original: des na yid rnam par shes pa dag ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su gyur pa las ma yin no zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: des na yid rnam par shes pa dag ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su gyur pa las ma yin no zhes rtogs so //
translated: Therefore, the mental cognitions are not from the transformation of the body in a sequential order.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa rgyu nyid yin na khyad par srid par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa rgyu nyid yin na khyad par srid par 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, if the collection is the cause, a difference is possible.

original: de lta ma yin na du ma nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'di gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na du ma nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'di gnas pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, there would be a plurality. This is the position.

original: de ltar ni mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ni mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not seen in this way.

original: gang gi rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa de yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa de yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: And how is it that many consciousnesses do not arise from a single consciousness?

original: 'dir lan du /
analyzed: 'dir lan du /
translated: The answer is:

original: rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the potency of consciousness is restricted,

original: gcig ni gcig gi rgyu yin te //
analyzed: gcig ni gcig gi rgyu yin te //
translated: one consciousness is the cause of another.

original: rnam shes don gzhan chags pa yis //
analyzed: rnam shes don gzhan chags pa yis //
translated: Because consciousness, which is attached to something else,

original: nus med don gzhan mi 'dzin phyir //
analyzed: nus med don gzhan mi 'dzin phyir //
translated: does not apprehend a powerless other.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rgyu yin no //
translated: The nature of the immediately preceding condition is that one consciousness is the cause of another.üîΩThe restriction of potency is due to the latent impressions of the formative forces that are in conformity with it.

original: nus pa nges pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi bag chags @94b sam /üîΩchags pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: nus pa nges pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi bag chags @94b sam / chags pa'i khyad par te /
translated: The restriction of potency is due to the latent impressions of the formative forces that are in conformity with it.

original: bag chags brten pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bar du chod kyang mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi nus pa'i khyad par bsgrub pas rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bag chags brten pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bar du chod kyang mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi nus pa'i khyad par bsgrub pas rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: The consciousness that is the basis of the latent impressions, although interrupted, is the cause of the production of a particular consciousness because it establishes a special potency as the immediately preceding condition.

original: 'ga' zhig gam /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gam /
translated: A particular consciousness is produced.

original: yang na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen /
analyzed: yang na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen /
translated: Or, it is the immediately preceding condition.üîΩüîΩ

original: rjes su mthun pa sad par byed pa la ste /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa sad par byed pa la ste /
translated: Or else, the immediately preceding condition is the cause of the arising of the similar.

original: 'di ltar / bag chags brtan pa la brten nas //üîΩmtshungs pa de ma thag med par //üîΩrnam shes snga ma nyid las ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bag chags brtan pa la brten nas // mtshungs pa de ma thag med par // rnam shes snga ma nyid las ni //
translated: In fact,

original: rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin //
translated: the imagination of what is unreal arises from the former consciousness itself, on the basis of the firm impression of the latter.üîΩThe imagination of what is unreal arises from the former consciousness itself, on the basis of the firm impression of the latter.üîΩThe imagination of what is unreal arises from the former consciousness itself, on the basis of the firm impression of the latter.

original: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig ni //üîΩmtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig ni // mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las //
translated: Some imaginations arise from the immediately preceding condition,

original: nye ba nyid du skye ba mthong //
analyzed: nye ba nyid du skye ba mthong //
translated: because they are seen to arise in close proximity.

original: gzhan ni bar du gcad phyir min //
analyzed: gzhan ni bar du gcad phyir min //
translated: Others do not, because they are interrupted.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags bar du chod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni nus pa'i yul gyi khyad par skabs su bar du zhugs pa gzhan gyis bskyed par ma mthong ngo //üîΩde bas na rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa gcig gam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags bar du chod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni nus pa'i yul gyi khyad par skabs su bar du zhugs pa gzhan gyis bskyed par ma mthong ngo // de bas na rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa gcig gam /
translated: The imaginations that are interrupted by the impressions of consciousness are not seen to arise from the production of something else that intervenes between them and the object of their capacity.

original: du ma yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: du ma yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to establish that consciousness arises from consciousness, whether it be one or many.

original: gal te lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang rnam par shes pa de nyid las nges par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang rnam par shes pa de nyid las nges par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Even if many consciousnesses arise from the body, they would definitely arise from that very consciousness.

original: dper na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang /
analyzed: dper na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang /
translated: For example, even if many sense consciousnesses arise,

original: res 'ga' chags pa'i yul la chags pa'i khyad par de nyid las rnam par shes pa gcig nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: res 'ga' chags pa'i yul la chags pa'i khyad par de nyid las rnam par shes pa gcig nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: sometimes a single consciousness arises from that very object of attachment, due to the specific attachment.

original: de la brjod pa /
analyzed: de la brjod pa /
translated: To that, we reply:

original: gal te lus las cig car blo //
analyzed: gal te lus las cig car blo //
translated: If the mind arises simultaneously from the body,

original: skyes shing phyis ni rang rigs las //
analyzed: skyes shing phyis ni rang rigs las //
translated: and later from its own type,

original: des na lus kyi nus pa ni //
analyzed: des na lus kyi nus pa ni //
translated: then why does the potency of the body

original: ci yi phyir na ldog pa yin //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na ldog pa yin //
translated: cease?

original: gal te lus las rnam par shes pa skye na /
analyzed: gal te lus las rnam par shes pa skye na /
translated: If consciousness arises from the body,

original: de las phyis kyang de srid nyid 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las phyis kyang de srid nyid 'gyur te /
translated: it would arise from that later as well,

original: lus kyi nus pa de lta bu nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi nus pa de lta bu nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the potency of the body exists in that way.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa rang gi nus pa nges pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa yin mod /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa rang gi nus pa nges pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa yin mod /
translated: If consciousness is the producer of consciousness because of the certainty of its own potency,

original: lus ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan skyed par 'gyur ro //üîΩ'on te / rnam par shes pa des lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan skyed pa'i nus pa bcom pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lus ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan skyed par 'gyur ro // 'on te / rnam par shes pa des lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan skyed pa'i nus pa bcom pa'i phyir /
translated: because the body remains just as it was, consciousness arises in a different way.

original: lus las rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lus las rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that consciousness does not arise from the body in a different way because that consciousness destroys the potential for the arising of another consciousness in the body,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that also is not so.

original: don 'di tshad ma 'ga' yis kyang //
analyzed: don 'di tshad ma 'ga' yis kyang //
translated: Because this meaning

original: spyod yul du ni byas ma yin //
analyzed: spyod yul du ni byas ma yin //
translated: is not made an object of any valid cognition.

original: rnam shes nyid las rnam shes ni //
analyzed: rnam shes nyid las rnam shes ni //
translated: Consciousness arises from consciousness

original: skye @95a * //
analyzed: skye @95a * //
translated: itself,

original: bar tshad mas nges phyir ro //
analyzed: bar tshad mas nges phyir ro //
translated: because it is ascertained by valid cognition.

original: rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye zhing /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye zhing /
translated: Many consciousnesses arise from the body itself, which is devoid of consciousness.

original: phyis ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa du ma skyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa ni ma yin no //üîΩdes na gal te /
analyzed: phyis ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa du ma skyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa ni ma yin no // des na gal te /
translated: Later, consciousness itself does not destroy the potential for the arising of many consciousnesses.

original: lus las skye ba yin na /
analyzed: lus las skye ba yin na /
translated: Therefore, if consciousness arises from the body,üîΩthen consciousness would not arise from the body in a different way.

original: rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa gcig dang gcig nyid skye bar byed pa yin yang lus kyi nus pa ma nyams pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa gcig dang gcig nyid skye bar byed pa yin yang lus kyi nus pa ma nyams pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Consciousness produces consciousness, but because the body‚Äôs capacity is not destroyed, consciousness does not arise from another consciousness.

original: gang gis da ni rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ngas rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skyed do zhes lus skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gis da ni rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ngas rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skyed do zhes lus skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ba /
translated: Since consciousness arises from consciousness, it is not the case that I do not produce another consciousness.

original: rgyu rnams rtog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do //üîΩ'on te / brgya la 'di ltar yang 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams rtog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do // 'on te / brgya la 'di ltar yang 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: There is no cause whatsoever that is endowed with conceptual thought.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: But if this were the case,üîΩthen the effect would destroy the cause‚Äôs capacity to produce its own effect.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect destroys the cause.üîΩIf the effect destroys the cause, then the effect would arise without a cause.

original: 'bras bu nyid kyis rgyu'i rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa'o zhe na /üîΩlus las rnam shes du ma ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid kyis rgyu'i rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa'o zhe na / lus las rnam shes du ma ni //
translated: But it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect destroys the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.

original: 'byung zhing de yi rjes thogs la //üîΩshes pas 'joms pa mthong nas ni //
analyzed: 'byung zhing de yi rjes thogs la // shes pas 'joms pa mthong nas ni //
translated: But it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,

original: la lar shes pas mthong nas ni //
analyzed: la lar shes pas mthong nas ni //
translated: then the effect would arise without a cause.üîΩBut it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.

original: 'joms dogs par ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: 'joms dogs par ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: But it is not tenable that the effect arises without a cause.üîΩTherefore, it is not tenable that the effect arises from the cause.üîΩIf the effect arises from the cause,üîΩthen the effect would arise without a cause.

original: la lar dogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: la lar dogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: and for some, doubt.

original: don 'di la ni dogs pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang ma dmigs la /
analyzed: don 'di la ni dogs pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang ma dmigs la /
translated: But we see no reason for doubt in this matter.

original: rgyu mtshan med par dogs pa yang ma yin no //üîΩde yi phyogs su lhung ba yi //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par dogs pa yang ma yin no // de yi phyogs su lhung ba yi //
translated: And it is not proper to doubt without reason.üîΩThe power of habit, which is the cause of the error,

original: nus pa goms pa las 'gyur te //
analyzed: nus pa goms pa las 'gyur te //
translated: is the reason for the appearance of the reflection.

original: rnam par shes pa'i nges byed nyid //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i nges byed nyid //
translated: The reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection,

original: goms pa las ni skyes pa yin //üîΩde'i rigs can gyi rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: goms pa las ni skyes pa yin // de'i rigs can gyi rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.

original: de'i rigs can nyid las yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa na rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pas 'di lus la skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rigs can nyid las yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa na rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pas 'di lus la skye ba ma yin no //
translated: The reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.

original: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma 'byung ba las rnam par shes pa gcig po de las rnam par shes pa gcig yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na /üîΩbrjod pa bden te /
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma 'byung ba las rnam par shes pa gcig po de las rnam par shes pa gcig yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na / brjod pa bden te /
translated: The reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.

original: brjod pa tsam gyis ni lan thebs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa tsam gyis ni lan thebs pa ma yin no //
translated: The reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the result of the reflection.üîΩThe reflection is the cause of the cognition of the reflection, and the cognition is the

original: 'on kyang rigs pas brjod pas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rigs pas brjod pas so //
translated: But this is not so, because of reasoning.

original: de'i rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: chags pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chags pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skyed pa'i phyir /
translated: A consciousness that is not of the nature of attachment does not generate another consciousness that is different from it.

original: byed pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not engage in action.

original: sngon goms pa med par ni chags par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon goms pa med par ni chags par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And without prior habituation, attachment does not occur.

original: des na rang bzhin gang la rnam par shes pa @95b sngon goms pa de 'dra ba nyid la phyis chags par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin gang la rnam par shes pa @95b sngon goms pa de 'dra ba nyid la phyis chags par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, attachment occurs only with respect to that very nature with which the consciousness has been previously habituated.

original: des na sngon goms pa nyid las rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
analyzed: des na sngon goms pa nyid las rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
translated: Thus, another consciousness does not arise from prior habituation.

original: gang la 'jig rten gzhan med pa //
analyzed: gang la 'jig rten gzhan med pa //
translated: For one who has no other world,

original: de la sngon goms srid ma yin //
analyzed: de la sngon goms srid ma yin //
translated: prior habituation is impossible.

original: sngon goms pa ni yod min na //
analyzed: sngon goms pa ni yod min na //
translated: If prior habituation does not exist,

original: rnam shes gzhan dag bzlog mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam shes gzhan dag bzlog mi 'gyur //
translated: other consciousnesses will not be averted.

original: des na lus de yin pa na //
analyzed: des na lus de yin pa na //
translated: Therefore, in that body,

original: lus las byung ba'i rnam shes kyi //
analyzed: lus las byung ba'i rnam shes kyi //
translated: the collection of consciousnesses that arise from the body

original: tshogs ni yang dang yang 'byung bar //
analyzed: tshogs ni yang dang yang 'byung bar //
translated: will occur again and again.

original: 'gyur ba de ni mthong ba med //
analyzed: 'gyur ba de ni mthong ba med //
translated: This is not seen.

original: 'on te lus de'i skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'on te lus de'i skad cig ma //
translated: Or is it the first moment of the body?

original: dang po nyid ni rigs pa yi //
analyzed: dang po nyid ni rigs pa yi //
translated: If it is the first moment,

original: skyed byed phyi mar 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: skyed byed phyi mar 'gyur ba ni //
translated: the subsequent moments are not its cause,

original: mi mthun phyir na rgyu nyid min //
analyzed: mi mthun phyir na rgyu nyid min //
translated: because they are not similar to it.

original: nur nur po la phyi mar gyur pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skyed byed ma yin te /
analyzed: nur nur po la phyi mar gyur pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skyed byed ma yin te /
translated: The subsequent moments of the body, which are not similar to the first moment, are not the cause of the consciousnesses.

original: skyed par byed pa dang / mi mthun pa'i yang skyed par byed pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa dang / mi mthun pa'i yang skyed par byed pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It is not possible that what is not a cause of something in the first place becomes its cause later on.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: gal te rig pa dang po nyid //
analyzed: gal te rig pa dang po nyid //
translated: If the first moment of consciousness

original: lus kyi mtshan nyid las 'byung na //
analyzed: lus kyi mtshan nyid las 'byung na //
translated: arises from the characteristics of the body,

original: de nas lus ni rten min pas //
analyzed: de nas lus ni rten min pas //
translated: then the body would not be its support,

original: rig pa 'ba' zhig kho nar gyur //üîΩphan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa dag ni //
analyzed: rig pa 'ba' zhig kho nar gyur // phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa dag ni //
translated: and consciousness would exist without a support.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: That which is not a beneficiary and that which does not benefit are not in a relationship of support and supported.

original: de lta yin na rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If this were so, consciousness would exist without a support.

original: 'on kyang lus lhan cig byed ba can gyi rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa des na 'ba' zhig gnas pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang lus lhan cig byed ba can gyi rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa des na 'ba' zhig gnas pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not the case that consciousness alone is the cause of the body, since the body is the cause of consciousness.

original: de lta na rnam par shes pa nyid las /
analyzed: de lta na rnam par shes pa nyid las /
translated: In that case, consciousness would arise from consciousness alone,

original: rnam par shes pa yin la lus ni lhan cig byed pa yin pas nged kyi gzhung nyid btsugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yin la lus ni lhan cig byed pa yin pas nged kyi gzhung nyid btsugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the body would be the co-originator of consciousness.

original: 'on te dang po lus nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: 'on te dang po lus nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: But if the body is the cause of the first moment of consciousness,

original: dper na autpala la lci ba'i rdzas bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na autpala la lci ba'i rdzas bzhin te /
translated: like the heavy substance of the lotus is the cause of the lotus,

original: phyi nas ni autpala nyid las autpala skye ba bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyi nas ni autpala nyid las autpala skye ba bzhin no zhe na /
translated: then later, the body would be the cause of consciousness, just as the lotus is the cause of the lotus.

original: de lta na ni 'o na ba lang gi lci ba med kyang phyis kyang autpala las kyang autpala 'byung ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na ba lang gi lci ba med kyang phyis kyang autpala las kyang autpala 'byung ba de bzhin du /
translated: In that case, even if there is no heavy substance of the lotus, the lotus would arise from the lotus.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gnas par thal lo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gnas par thal lo //
translated: In the same way, even if there is no body, consciousness would arise from consciousness alone.

original: 'on te lus kyang rgyu nyid du dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te lus kyang rgyu nyid du dmigs so zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the body is also observed as the cause of consciousness,

original: bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bden mod kyi /
translated: that is true.

original: nye bar len pa'i rgyu nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rgyu nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the material cause of the body,

original: 'on kyang lhan cig byed pa nyid du'o zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'on kyang lhan cig byed pa nyid du'o zhes bshad zin to //
translated: but rather a cooperative condition.

original: 'on te sngar nye bar len pa'i yin la phyis lhan cig byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sngar nye bar len pa'i yin la phyis lhan cig byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is the material cause of the body at an earlier time, and a cooperative condition at a later time,

original: nye bar len pa ni phyis lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni phyis lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: then the body is not a cooperative condition at an earlier time.

original: gal te lus ni nye bar len na /üîΩci ltar @96a * //
analyzed: gal te lus ni nye bar len na / ci ltar @96a * //
translated: If the body is the material cause of the body,

original: lhan cig byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: lhan cig byed par 'gyur //
translated: how can it be a cooperative condition?

original: de lta nyid du mthong phyir na //
analyzed: de lta nyid du mthong phyir na //
translated: Because it is seen to be so.

original: 'dir ni mthong bar rtogs pa med //
analyzed: 'dir ni mthong bar rtogs pa med //
translated: But it is not seen to be so here.

original: ba lang gi lci ba dang autpala las kyang de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang gi lci ba dang autpala las kyang de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the case that the body arises from cow dung and blue lotus flowers,

original: de gnyis la ni khyad bar chen po yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //üîΩgsal pa la sogs skyes pa yi //
analyzed: de gnyis la ni khyad bar chen po yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to // gsal pa la sogs skyes pa yi //
translated: because there is a great difference between them.üîΩSome cognitions arise from a clear object,

original: shes las la la mthong gang yin //
analyzed: shes las la la mthong gang yin //
translated: and some cognitions arise from an unclear object.

original: de nyid dang por mthong bas na //
analyzed: de nyid dang por mthong bas na //
translated: Because the first is seen,

original: rnam shes gzhan gyi sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: rnam shes gzhan gyi sgrub byed yin //
translated: it is a proof of another cognition.

original: de'i phyir lus las rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus las rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness does not arise from the body.

original: 'on te khyod kyi ltar na yang gal te /
analyzed: 'on te khyod kyi ltar na yang gal te /
translated: But if you think that even in your system,

original: lus rnam par shes pa'i rten ma yin na de'i tshe lus log kyang rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig gnas par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus rnam par shes pa'i rten ma yin na de'i tshe lus log kyang rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig gnas par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: if the body is not the basis of consciousness, then when the body is destroyed, consciousness would remain by itself.üîΩBecause there is no reason, it is not certain that they remain together.

original: rgyu mtshan med par lhan cig gnas pa nges pa ni ma yin no zhes 'dir gzhan dag gi dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par lhan cig gnas pa nges pa ni ma yin no zhes 'dir gzhan dag gi dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: Here, anticipating the objection of others, we reply:

original: gal te lus ni log pa na //üîΩrten min phyir na sems 'ba' zhig //
analyzed: gal te lus ni log pa na // rten min phyir na sems 'ba' zhig //
translated: If the body is destroyed,üîΩconsciousness would remain by itself,

original: gnas gyur zhe na gal te de'i //
analyzed: gnas gyur zhe na gal te de'i //
translated: because it would have no basis.üîΩIf you think that the continuum of consciousness

original: rgyu 'jug thob phyir sems kyi rgyun //
analyzed: rgyu 'jug thob phyir sems kyi rgyun //
translated: would remain, because the cause of its entry and obtainment would not change,

original: gnas rgyu yan lag mi 'gyur na //
analyzed: gnas rgyu yan lag mi 'gyur na //
translated: then the cause of its remaining would not change.

original: de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is ‚Äúconsciousness would remain by itself.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: When

original: tshe 'di nyid kyi skye mched snga //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid kyi skye mched snga //
translated: the former sense bases of this life

original: lus gzhan bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin //
analyzed: lus gzhan bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin //
translated: are the cause of producing another body,

original: de'i tshe ni 'ga' zhig gnas pa gal yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni 'ga' zhig gnas pa gal yin te /
translated: then at that time, there would be no remaining.

original: 'di ltar sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyus /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyus /
translated: Thus, the cause of the persistence of the mind

original: de'i rgyu 'jug ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu 'jug ste /
translated: is the cause of its engagement.

original: lus kyi rgyu mer mer po la sogs pa'i ming can de'i 'jug pa ni lus bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi rgyu mer mer po la sogs pa'i ming can de'i 'jug pa ni lus bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin no //
translated: The engagement of the cause of the body, which is called the kalala, etc., is directed toward the production of the body.

original: de thob pa ni lus kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig la yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de thob pa ni lus kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig la yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The attainment of the body does not exist in the cause of the body alone,

original: 'on kyang sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyun sngar gyi sems las kyi ming can de gang gi tshe yan lag lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyun sngar gyi sems las kyi ming can de gang gi tshe yan lag lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin na'o //
translated: but rather in the cause of the persistence of the mind, which is the previous mind called karma.

original: de'i yan lag nyid ni lus kyi sred pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i yan lag nyid ni lus kyi sred pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
translated: When it is the cause of the simultaneous activity of the body, it is not the cause of the body alone.

original: gal te de yan lag tu mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te de yan lag tu mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: If it were not a cause, then it would not be the cause of the persistence of the body alone.

original: lus gzhan skye ba la /
analyzed: lus gzhan skye ba la /
translated: In the production of another body,

original: tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga yin te /
analyzed: tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga yin te /
translated: the five sense-spheres of this life are the cause.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi lus skyes pa la yang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi lus skyes pa la yang /
translated: Even in the production of the body of one who has died in the formless realm,

original: de nyid 'du byed pa po nyid kyis rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'du byed pa po nyid kyis rgyu yin no //
translated: that mind alone is the cause by its very activity.

original: gal te shi ba'i 'og tu lus skye bam mthong ba'i phyir /üîΩde yan lag gi dngos por ma dmigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te shi ba'i 'og tu lus skye bam mthong ba'i phyir / de yan lag gi dngos por ma dmigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Because the body of the next life is not seen after death.üîΩIsn‚Äôt it the case that the body is not observed as a real entity of its parts?

original: gzugs med @96b pa'i khams su ni shin tu yang mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs med @96b pa'i khams su ni shin tu yang mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It is not seen at all in the formless realm.

original: 'di la bshad pa ni /üîΩde yi yan lag dngos po dang // rgyu nyid 'gog la mi dmigs pa //
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa ni / de yi yan lag dngos po dang // rgyu nyid 'gog la mi dmigs pa //
translated: The explanation of this is:üîΩThe negation of the real entity of its parts

original: nges byed min par rab tu bshad //
analyzed: nges byed min par rab tu bshad //
translated: and the cause is not a definite nonobservation.

original: dbang sogs kyang ni lhag ldan yin //
analyzed: dbang sogs kyang ni lhag ldan yin //
translated: It is well known that the faculties and so on are also possessed in excess.üîΩEven if the five sense bases of this life are not observed to produce the body of another life, still the continuum of the mind, which is called karma, does not exist in that way.

original: gal te yang tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga skye ba gzhan gyi lus skyed pa la yan lag gi gi dngos po ma dmigs pa de lta na yang sems kyi rgyun gyi las kyi ming can de ltar med do zhes ma dmigs pa tsam gyis de med par ngesüîΩpa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga skye ba gzhan gyi lus skyed pa la yan lag gi gi dngos po ma dmigs pa de lta na yang sems kyi rgyun gyi las kyi ming can de ltar med do zhes ma dmigs pa tsam gyis de med par nges pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not definite that it does not exist due to mere nonobservation.

original: ma dmigs pa nges par byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir 'di log par rtogs pa ci yod /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa nges par byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir 'di log par rtogs pa ci yod /
translated: Because it has already been explained that nonobservation is not a definite nonobservation, what misconception is there to be refuted?

original: 'on te yang /
analyzed: 'on te yang /
translated: Or,üîΩüîΩ

original: 'dir mi dmigs pa tsam zhig brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir mi dmigs pa tsam zhig brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, we are not speaking of mere non-apprehension,

original: 'on kyang khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: but rather of inference based on a pervasion that is established by prior direct perception.

original: 'di ltar ste dbang po gang yin pa de ni dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ste dbang po gang yin pa de ni dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, whatever is a sense faculty does not link with another sense faculty,

original: dper na lha sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa ldan pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa ldan pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: just as Devadatta‚Äôs eye, etc., do not link with Yaj√±adatta‚Äôs eye, etc.

original: skye ba 'di'i lus dang 'brel pa yang dbang po yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skye ba 'di'i lus dang 'brel pa yang dbang po yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The sense faculty that is related to the body of this birth is a sense faculty.

original: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o zhe na /
translated: This is the apprehension of a pervasion that is contradictory.

original: 'di ni med de /
analyzed: 'di ni med de /
translated: This is not so,

original: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is incomplete.

original: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa las ni don ci lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no//
analyzed: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa las ni don ci lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no//
translated: It has been explained that when it is incomplete, the meaning is not understood as it is.

original: skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po dang mtshams mi sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po dang mtshams mi sbyor ba ni /
translated: The non-linking of the sense faculty of another birth

original: ma dmigs pa tsam gyis go bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa tsam gyis go bar bya ba yin na /
translated: is to be understood by mere non-apprehension.

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa grub pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa grub pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But mere non-perception does not establish the negation of the object of negation.

original: 'on te tshe 'di pa'i lus su 'gyur pa'i dbang po dang mtshams sbyor ba dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan du yang de dang mtshams sbyor ba rjes su dpog na /
analyzed: 'on te tshe 'di pa'i lus su 'gyur pa'i dbang po dang mtshams sbyor ba dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan du yang de dang mtshams sbyor ba rjes su dpog na /
translated: If you infer the connection of the other with the sense-faculties that are the body of this life because you perceive the connection of the other with the sense-faculties,

original: de la yang grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de la yang grub pa yin te /
translated: then that is established.

original: de yang de'i tshe na tshe 'di pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang de'i tshe na tshe 'di pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that other is the body of this life at that time.

original: tshu rol dang pha rol bzhin no //
analyzed: tshu rol dang pha rol bzhin no //
translated: It is like this side and the other side.

original: 'on kyang khu khrag gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i dbang po zhes khyad par du byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang khu khrag gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i dbang po zhes khyad par du byed pa yin na /
translated: But if you qualify it as the sense-faculties generated by the other‚Äôs semen and blood,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa tsam med par mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa tsam med par mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because mere non-perception does not realize the absence of the object of negation in the other.

original: khu khrag gzhan nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa ni yul gyi khyad par bzhin dang / bum pa dang sgra'i khyad par bzhin skyob par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khu khrag gzhan nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa ni yul gyi khyad par bzhin dang / bum pa dang sgra'i khyad par bzhin skyob par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The qualification by the other‚Äôs semen and blood is not a savior, like the qualification by the difference of the object, or the qualification by the difference of the pot and sound.

original: 'di ltar / dbang po snga ma rang rigs la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dbang po snga ma rang rigs la //
translated: Thus:üîΩThe former sense faculty is seen to have the power

original: nus pa dag ni mthong @97a * //üîΩba yin // 'gyur ba mthong phyir gzhan dang gzhan //
analyzed: nus pa dag ni mthong @97a * // ba yin // 'gyur ba mthong phyir gzhan dang gzhan //
translated: with regard to its own type.üîΩSince a change is seen,

original: skye ba dag kyang grub pa nyid //
analyzed: skye ba dag kyang grub pa nyid //
translated: the arising of another is also established.

original: gsal ba'i khyad bar la ltos pa nyid la 'brel pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad bar la ltos pa nyid la 'brel pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of the relation is not dependent on the particular manifestation.

original: de lta ma yin na ni 'gas kyang 'gar yang tha snyad mi bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni 'gas kyang 'gar yang tha snyad mi bya ba nyid de /
translated: Otherwise, no one would ever make a convention,

original: tha snyad ni nus pa nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad ni nus pa nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the convention must be preceded by the ascertainment of the power.

original: tha snyan ni spyi'i yul can yin te /
analyzed: tha snyan ni spyi'i yul can yin te /
translated: The convention is based on the universal.

original: des na 'brel pa ni gsal ba tsam la brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'brel pa ni gsal ba tsam la brten pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the relation is not based on the mere manifestation.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus:

original: g-yo bag la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can gyi mig la sogs pa goms pa'i khyad par las de ltar skyes pa na /
analyzed: g-yo bag la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can gyi mig la sogs pa goms pa'i khyad par las de ltar skyes pa na /
translated: The eye, etc., which are concomitant with fickleness, etc., arise in that way from the special cultivation.

original: de lta bur gyur pa mthong ba las gzhan du de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa mthong ba las gzhan du de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
translated: From seeing that which has become like that, one infers that it will become like that in the future.

original: skye ba dang por ni de 'dra ba'i rgyu dbang po ma dmigs te /
analyzed: skye ba dang por ni de 'dra ba'i rgyu dbang po ma dmigs te /
translated: In the first moment of birth, such a cause, i.e., a sense-faculty, is not perceived.

original: des na skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since it arises from the sense-faculty of a previous life,

original: tshe 'di ba nyid dam gzhan gyi khyad par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshe 'di ba nyid dam gzhan gyi khyad par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not reasonable to distinguish this life from another life.

original: 'on te dbang po de ni gcig nyid de /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po de ni gcig nyid de /
translated: But if that sense-faculty is a single entity,

original: des na dbang po phyi ma phyi ma snga ma snga mas bskyed par ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: des na dbang po phyi ma phyi ma snga ma snga mas bskyed par ma grub po zhe na /
translated: then it is not established that the later sense-faculty is produced by the earlier sense-faculty.

original: gal te de lta yin du chug pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin du chug pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if that were so,

original: g-yo ba la sogs pa la goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid mthong ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: g-yo ba la sogs pa la goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid mthong ba'i phyir na /
translated: because we see that the practice of movement, etc. is preceded by practice,

original: goms pa sngon 'gro can nyid ni //
analyzed: goms pa sngon 'gro can nyid ni //
translated: practice is preceded by practice.

original: g-yo sogs rnams la mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: g-yo sogs rnams la mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because we see movement, etc.

original: de lta bur gyur pa rjes su dpog pa grub pa'i phyir gzhan ni don byed med do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa rjes su dpog pa grub pa'i phyir gzhan ni don byed med do //
translated: Since the inference of that kind is established, another is not a causal agent.

original: de gcig gam mi gcig ces bya ba 'di ni dgos pa med de /
analyzed: de gcig gam mi gcig ces bya ba 'di ni dgos pa med de /
translated: Whether it is one or not one, this is irrelevant.

original: thams cad du de'i rigs can gyi 'bras bu mthong bu mthong ba las rgyu de lta bu nyid yin no zhes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du de'i rigs can gyi 'bras bu mthong bu mthong ba las rgyu de lta bu nyid yin no zhes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: In all cases, one infers the cause from the effect, which is of the same nature as the cause.

original: goms pa las skyes pa'i yon tan rmi lam du lus gzhan la mthong ba yin no zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: goms pa las skyes pa'i yon tan rmi lam du lus gzhan la mthong ba yin no zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
translated: We have already shown that the qualities that arise from cultivation are seen in another body in a dream.

original: gzhan yang 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan skye ba nyid grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan skye ba nyid grub pa kho na'o //
translated: Moreover, the arising of another from another is established because we see a transformation of one into another.

original: des na dbus kyi gnas skabs su dbang po gzhan gyis dbang po gzhan skyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na dbus kyi gnas skabs su dbang po gzhan gyis dbang po gzhan skyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in the middle period, one sense faculty produces another sense faculty.

original: de ltar skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po mi skyed /
analyzed: de ltar skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po mi skyed /
translated: Therefore, the sense faculty of the next birth is not produced by the sense faculty of the present birth.

original: rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba tha dad na ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba tha dad na ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
translated: If there were a difference in the transformation of the essence, there would not be oneness,

original: sa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa bzhin no //
